extendedInfo.description: NES/Famicom emulator based on FCEUX 2.2.2-svn (GPL), designed and tested on the original Droid/Milestone, Xoom, Galaxy S2, Nexus 7, and Xperia Play, but works on many devices with similar specs. It's based on an up-to-date revision of well-known PC emulator FCEUX, offering some of the most accurate NES emulation on Android.Features include:* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. State files from FCEUX should work on NES.emu and vice-versa.* Supports ROM-based games in .nes and .unf formats, optionally in zip files* Famicom Disk System emulation using .fds files (select your BIOS in the options first)* VS UniSystem support, push Start to insert coins* Uses FCEU-compatible cheat files (.cht extension) with editing features* Zapper/Gun support, touch screen to fire, touch & hold outside of display area to simulate firing away from the TV * Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls in addition to keyboard controls (up to 4 touches supported at once), and an Xperia Play optimized button layout* Multiplayer-capable Wiimote/Classic Controller/Wii U Pro Controller, iControlPad, and Zeemote JS1 support (Wii controllers not yet working on Android 4.2), also works with any generic Bluetooth/USB gamepad supported by AndroidNo ROMs are included with this app and must be supplied by the user. A number of public domain games/demos are available at www.pdroms.de. Transfer games anywhere to your internal storage/SD card and browse to them from within the app (default SD card directory is /mnt/sdcard).Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:https://twitter.com/rakashaziVisit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps (including Snes9x EX). Please report any crashes or device-specific problems via email (include your device name and OS version) so future updates continue to run on as many devices as possible.

reviews.title: The best!!!!!
reviews.comment: Have 1500+ roms on my Tab 10.1. Linked it w/a bluetooth controller, n BAM!!! instant portable NES. Can\'t wait to start getting SNES roms!!
reviews.author: edward grey

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The developer is the best at all console emulators for nexus 7.  I have almost all of emulators that have been released. I have not had one glitch in any of there apps ever!!!!!!!! I am still waiting for a 64 emulator!! Please make one soon . keep up the great work an I will keep buying .
reviews.author: Christopher Yarbor

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Not the prettiest UI of all the nes emulators out there but it\'s simple and does the job! Hope that the author continues to port other console emulators to android like n64, atari 5200, 7800, intellivision..
reviews.author: Don Yarbrough

reviews.title: By far the best NES emulator.
reviews.comment: Smooth slick and extremely stable. What more could you ask for from an emulator. How about flawless light gun support, it has that too. On top of all that its made by an amazing developer that actually takes the time to answer messages. He\'ll even help you fix whatever problem you might have, which well probably be user error as this developers emulators are practically perfect.
reviews.author: Thomas Ford

reviews.title: Best in market
reviews.comment: Developer very helpful and responded to email quickly....best emulator I\'ve used.
reviews.author: Rich Bartolowits

reviews.title: No moga
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work with moga pro controller. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Craig Christopher

reviews.title: Can\'t get any of the roms to play.
reviews.comment: I have sent two emails without response in three days going four now... so disappointed....:\343\200\212

reviews.title: Great but stuck
reviews.comment: Awesome emulator but cant fiqure out how to link moga controller

reviews.title: Absolutely the Best thing to happen on android
reviews.comment: All his emulators run beautiful on the samsung galaxy note 10.1.Just beautiful:))

reviews.comment: Will not let me play games

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Beets both NES-FC and John NES hands down. Great emulator.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Lots of fun On the go
reviews.author: Pablo Ortiz

reviews.title: Best emulator
reviews.comment: Been a fan of this for a long time. Back to my Atrix 4G. Now on my Note 2, it\'s even more amazing. Just need it to be an option when clicking a rom to show up in the \"complete action using\" dialog.
reviews.author: Jeff Quintal

reviews.title: Crazy Good
reviews.comment: Works great with my Nexus 4 & 7. The ability to link with a bluetooth controller is great. Best Emu I\'ve tried.
reviews.author: Burk B

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Bought this so I could run Baseball Stars.  It\'s been over 20 years since I\'ve had the chance to play that game and it\'s as good as I remember.  Running on a Nexus 7
reviews.author: Andrew Hiltz
